A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Fantastic\, surprising\, and every bit a Star Wars movie. I was exhilarated from start to finish\, and loved both the development of new characters and fleshing out of those players we met in Force Awakens. This Star Wars defies the rules at every turn\, but never leaves you feeling lost in space. I would challenge those who may be up in arms or indignant about this 'upset' to take a good look at Episodes 4-6. As if there weren't head-turning twists in the original trilogy! If you like your movies to predictably recycle the same old tropes and give you the same staid characters of yore\, this ain't the movie you're looking for 💫✋🏽 But if you are here for the best parts about Star Wars stories\, big laughs\, occasional tears\, daring heroics and tenebrous evildoers\, saddle up. The Force is strong with The Last Jedi.
